description: Adds ability to customize retry delays for DynamoDB. This previously worked for all services except DynamoDB. Also adds jitter to DynamoDB retries. See `AWS.Config.retryDelayOptions` for more information.
Allow customization of a waiter using a special `$waiter` key
Adds support for new runtime Node.js v6.10 for AWS Lambda service. :tada:
Adding waiters for Elastic Load Balancing V2
Adds export configuration options to the API.
